parameters.name: AddList
parameters.description: The protected objects that you want to add to the protected object group. You can add multiple protected objects to a protected object group at the same time. You can specify multiple protected objects. Separate them with commas (,).

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the protected object group.

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the protected object group that you want to create.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the Web Application Firewall (WAF) instance.

>  You can call the [DescribeInstance](~~433756~~) operation to obtain the ID of the WAF instance.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region of the WAF instance. Valid values:

*   **cn-hangzhou**: Chinese mainland.
*   **ap-southeast-1**: Outside the Chinese mainland.

parameters.name: ResourceManagerResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.
